title: Janna bird animation
body:
Just got the shiny legendary Janna skin and noticed her cloud spawns with her at level 1 without leveling up W and thought it was a bug on that skin so I checked regular Janna and noticed the same, isn't the bird not meant to spawn until W has at least one point? Seems a bit annoying to enemy players who would think W is up. I swear this didn't use to happen but I could well be wrong.
TL;DR
Dno if animation is bug or intended

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm unsure if this is intended or not, I've asked a few people and they're not really sure either.

If this is occurring 100% of the time when you play Janna, it couldn't hurt to [post a bug report](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) just in case.

Please remember to read the "[How to Report a Game Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug)" sticky thread before posting.
